title: The best wit and wisdom from Warren Buffett and Charlie Munger at Berkshire Hathaway's annual meeting
description: The funniest and most insightful moments from the question-and-answer session

title: Warren Buffett says Berkshire Hathaway won't take full control of Occidental Petroleum
description: Warren Buffett said Berkshire doesn't plan on taking full control of Occidental Petroleum, an oil giant where it has amassed a stake north of 20%.

title: Warren Buffett says letting Silicon Valley Bank customers go under would’ve been 'catastrophic’
description: Berkshire Hathaway CEO Warren Buffett said Saturday that regulators avoided a financial disaster by making sure Silicon Valley Bank clients didn't lose money.

title: Buffett explains value investing: 'What gives you opportunities is other people doing dumb things'
description: Value investing typically refers to buying underappreciated stocks or businesses and selling them at a higher value.

title: Threat of TikTok ban has creators scrambling to build followings on Instagram, YouTube
description: As U.S. lawmakers threaten a nationwide TikTok ban, creators are worried about what that would mean for their livelihood.

title: Berkshire Hathaway's operating earnings increase 12% in the first quarter, cash hoard tops $130 billion
description: Berkshire Hathaway's operating earnings jumped in the first quarter, thanks in part to a rebound in the conglomerate's insurance business.

title: What Chile's state-led lithium policy means for the future of the electric vehicle industry
description: Chile has vast lithium reserves, and the recent release of the country's state-led national lithium policy is ushering in a new era for the industry.
